title: Banitem插件ban一个物品就全都ban了，怎么解决啊
txt_content: 求大神解答，我想ban了核弹和扳手，请问还有什么办法吗

replies.author: Naive。
replies.txt_content:
banitem正确用法:
手拿一个物品  banitem add
这个物品就被禁了

replies.author: GTR0132
replies.txt_content: 必须手里拿着那个东西输入/banitem add 理由

replies.author: q211316907
replies.txt_content:
推荐你去看清楚指令了再来http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=131739&highlight=banitem
